mapper.sql: mid, uid, createtime, updatetime, umstatus, bkid
mapper.insert:
insert into usermission
mid,
uid,
createtime,
updatetime,
umstatus,
bkid,
#{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{umstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{bkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mapper.update:
update usermission
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
umstatus = #{umstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bkid = #{bkid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and uid = #{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from usermission where uid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and createtime < #{date,jdbcType=BIGINT} and createtime > #{today,jdbcType=BIGINT}
